title: Virus Filter
description:
You send us a file or a URL of a file, and we will tell you if it contains a virus.  Super cool, super easy.

Wanna test it out?  Send the eicar test virus as a Base64 encoded string, or send us a link to the file online!  Learn more about the Eicar test file at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EICAR_test_file
